list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control) - Content subject to frequent changes

list.descmd:
## Release Notes
This is a patch release due to a wrong draft marking of the IG. The status is changed to be active. Aslo, a spelling error is corrected and a more detailed description of resources in the index page is added.

## Release Notes
This is the  first release of this IG.

title: DK MedCom EKG
introduction: The EKG project has been established with the overall objective of supporting secure, consistent, and nationwide sharing of electrocardiograms (EKGs) across healthcare providers.
